channel.title: La Valee (Obscured by Clouds):: Makyo (Pink Floyd cover)
channel.description:
A cover of the 1972 Pink Floyd instrumental. Made entirely in Auxy except for a low synth drone and one of three arps coming from Groovebox as samples .... The lead melody was done by combining Fragment, Jelly, and Bold steel, and you can also hear Melt holding drone notes in the background.
https://soundcloud.com/dakini-records/la-vallee-obscured-by-clouds-makyo
